HARE Microtasks
Metadata is utilized by the 
microtask manager to 
automatically generate 
well-described crowd tasks 
Microtasks are submitted to  
crowdsourcing platforms, 
e.g., CrowdFlower or 
Mechanical Turk
Answers collected from the 
crowd are represented as 
structured data
